pageContent: Objective: To evaluate the effect of the early use of the vacuum erection device (VED) on erectile dysfunction (ED) and penile shortening after radical retropubic prostatectomy (RP), as these are important concerns for men choosing among treatment alternatives for localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Focal prostate cryoablation: initial results show cancer control and potency preservation
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16999628/
